sentence: Trending News U.S. proposes limiting consideration of public benefits for green cards Information warfare expert says U.S. is finally countering Russia at its own game Kevin McCarthy backs Liz Cheney's primary challenger Harriet Hageman Russia expels U.S. embassy's second-in-command amid Ukraine tensions Intel arm of DHS defends office amid GOP senator's criticism Kathryn Watson Kathryn Watson is a politics reporter for CBS News Digital based in Washington, D.C.

title: All members of Congress can attend Biden's State of the Union, with COVID-19 restrictions
